text: The Keeranur police arrested Ramalingam (42) of Mettupatti village near here on a charge of having murdered his wife Shanthi (36) at their residence on Saturday. Police said that a wordy duel between Ramalingam and Shanthi led to the incident. Ramalingam attacked her with a log of wood, causing serious head injuries. She died on the spot. — Special Correspondent
title: Man arrested on murder charge
